    Product Information

    Description

    This Bladesafe knife edge guard has a secure locking mechanism featuring a latch that snaps shut and securely encloses the blade to keep it clean and safe for travel or storage making it ideal for on the go business, professional chefs, or for spare knives kept in a drawer or cabinet. Additionally each cover has soft rubber pads on the inside of the case that grips the blade tightly to prevent it from sliding around inside the container to keep it razor sharp and ready for use. This tough knife edge guard is made from high quality, nontoxic, food grade plastic designed to resist damage and protect hands from cuts. Also this product is clear so your kitchen staff can effortlessly sift through drawers to find the blade they need for any requested dishes. Furthermore this protective sheath has a universal design that fits small blades 3 to 4 inches long such as paring knives for top rate assurance concerning protection for your employees and cutlery. Plus other sizes of Blade Safe guards are available from Hubert.com to correspond with almost any knife in your establishments kitchen.
